subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Penguins, trailing the Bruins by 3-0, have played more than 215 minutes in the Eastern Conference finals, but the next lead they take will be their first.
snippet: The Penguins, trailing the Bruins by 3-0, have played more than 215 minutes in the Eastern Conference finals, but the next lead they take will be their first.
